de.eckhartarnold.client

Class ProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • Composite
      • de.eckhartarnold.client.ProgressBar

  • public class ProgressBar
extends Composite
    A progress bar widget.

    The progress bar is initialized with a "maximum" value (integer). And the progress is then updated with method setValue. An optional label displays the progress in text from, e.g. "5/12".

    Author:
    ecki
